attributes.action: Ensure pubs stock diet lemonade for customers health benefits
attributes.additional_details: This will help diabetics and provide a healthier choice when ordering mixers.
attributes.background: Diet lemonade isn’t stocked in pubs to use as mixers, however Diet Coke/Pepsi is available. Diet drinks are subject to zero tax so there is no reason not to offer the choice.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual pubs to take.
